actionConfiguration.body:
INSERT INTO Tasks (
	AssignedTo,
	DueDate,
	ProjectID,
	EstimatedHours,
	HoursLeft,
	Requestor,
	CompleteDate,
	Task_Timestamp,
	Task_UserName,
	TaskDescription,
	TaskStatus
)
VALUES (
	'{{insert_form.formData.AssignedTo}}',
	'{{insert_form.formData.DueDate}}',
	'{{insert_form.formData.ProjectID}}',
	'{{insert_form.formData.EstimatedHours}}',
	'{{insert_form.formData.HoursLeft}}',
	'{{insert_form.formData.Requestor}}',
	'{{insert_form.formData.CompleteDate}}',
	'{{insert_form.formData.Task_Timestamp}}',
	'{{insert_form.formData.Task_UserName}}',
	'{{insert_form.formData.TaskDescription}}',
	'{{insert_form.formData.TaskStatus}}'
);
